content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I was commanded to browse a website for customs and traditions around the world. Command "google" with the argument "websites that discuss customs and traditions of different countries" returned a list of websites that discuss customs and traditions of different countries by country, including resources on health literacy, foreign service, indigenous peoples, and organizational culture. Command "google" with the argument "websites that discuss customs and traditions of different countries by region" returned a list of websites that discuss customs and traditions of different countries by region. I was then commanded to browse the websites and search for customs and traditions of different countries by region and found several websites, including the Foreign Service Institute, Amnesty International, UNESCO, and the European Capitals of Culture.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://travel.state.gov/content/travel/en/international-travel/before-you-go/travelers-with-special-considerations/women-travelers.html", "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/books/NBK44249/", "https://www.amnesty.org/en/what-we-do/indigenous-peoples/", "https://wwwnc.cdc.gov/travel/page/medical-tourism", "https://www.oecd.org/education/Global-competency-for-an-inclusive-world.pdf", "https://www.pewresearch.org/internet/2021/05/19/americans-and-cancel-culture-where-some-see-calls-for-accountability-others-see-censorship-punishment/", "https://op.europa.eu/webpub/com/eu-what-it-is/en/", "https://www.pewresearch.org/internet/2019/03/07/use-of-smartphones-and-social-media-is-common-across-most-emerging-economies/"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://wwwnc.cdc.gov/travel/page/medical-tourism", "question": "What are some customs and traditions of different countries?"}}}'}]
"""
